definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: His appointment must be approved by the U.S. Senate.
sentences.chinese: 他的任命须经美国参议院批准。

sentences.english: The U. S. Senate may take up a similar bill in November.
sentences.chinese: 美国参议院可能会在十一月讨论一条类似的法案。

sentences.english: U. S. Senate OKs Gary Locke as ambassador to China.
sentences.chinese: 美国参议院骆家辉作为驻中国大使。

sentences.english: U. S. Senate ratifies nuke arms treaty with Russia.
sentences.chinese: 美国参议院批准与俄罗斯签署核裁军条约。

sentences.english: A legislative attempt to overturn the ban failed in the US Senate last month.
sentences.chinese: 一个立法试图推翻这项禁令失败在美国参议院上个月。

sentences.english: Today, the U. S. Senate seems determined to make the Sejm look good by comparison.
sentences.chinese: 今天，美国参议院似乎下定决心，要让色姆相形见拙。

sentences.english: The U. S. Senate has approved a three-trillion dollar budget plan.
sentences.chinese: 美国参议院通过了一项三兆美元财政预算计划。

sentences.english: Step 2, US senate has to confirm you.
sentences.chinese: 第二步是美国参议院要对你进行确认。

sentences.english: A schedule of upcoming hearings is available on the U.S. Senate Web site.
sentences.chinese: 听证会的具体日程载于美国参议院网站。

definition: lower house of bicameral assembly/House of Representatives (USA)/Chamber of Deputies
abbr. for 參議院|参议院[can1 yi4 yuan4], senate/upper chamber (of legislative assembly)
McCain (name)/John McCain (1936-2018), US Republican politician, Senator for Arizona 1987-2018
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
